text.en: oṃ āḥ hūṃ hrīḥ
text.en-trans: om ah hung hrih

text.en: In the luminous dharmakāya space of unchanging primordial wisdom,
text.en-trans: gyurmé yeshe ösal chökü ying

text.en: A realm where immaculate, self-arisen lights of five colours flicker,
text.en-trans: zakmé rangjung ö nga trukpé zhing

text.en: Is the palace of the swirling lotuses of great bliss;
text.en-trans: dechen pema khyilwé podrang né

text.en: From which, moved by the intense love of boundless compassion,
text.en-trans: tsemé tukjé tsewé jé chakpé

text.en: Arise unimaginable, dance-like displays of illusory manifestation:
text.en-trans: samyé gyutrul drawé rol gar lé

text.en: Amitābha, ‘Boundless Light’, the brilliance of discerning wisdom,
text.en-trans: sortok yeshe ziji ö tayé

text.en: Padma Naṭeśvara, ‘Lotus Lord of the Dance’, master of all the world,
text.en-trans: jikten wangchuk pema gar gyi wang

text.en: Mighty Hayagrīva, universal splendour of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa,
text.en-trans: khordé chipal wangchen ta dong zhé

text.en: Sublime Pema Gyalpo, ‘Lotus King’, who controls the three realms,
text.en-trans: kham sum wangdü pema gyalpo chok

text.en: Guhyajñāna, ‘Secret Wisdom’, ḍākinī of great bliss,
text.en-trans: dechen sangwa yeshe dakki ma

text.en: Kurukullā, magnetizer of everything in existence and quiescence,
text.en-trans: sizhi ngö kün wang dzé rikjé wang

text.en: Saṃvara, king of desire who subjugates appearance and existence,
text.en-trans: nangsi zilnön demchok döpé gyal

text.en: Red Mahākāla, passionate vajra, subduer of the arrogant hordes,
text.en-trans: gön mar chakpé dorjé drek tsok dul

text.en: Great deity Gaṇapati, magnetizer of the triple world,
text.en-trans: si sum wang dzé lhachen tsok kyi dak

text.en: Wrathful Ṭakkirāja, captivator of the three realms,
text.en-trans: kham sum yiguk trowo döpé gyal

text.en: Lord Mahādeva, progenitor of all the world,
text.en-trans: jikten mepo wangchuk lha chenpo

text.en: Mistress of desire, playful emanation of every form of bliss and delight,
text.en-trans: dechen gyé gü gar rol döwang ma

text.en: King Gesar, attractor of all that is good in existence and quiescence—
text.en-trans: sizhi lektsok wangdü gesar gyal

text.en: Three Root deities who have mastered the activity of magnetizing,
text.en-trans: wang gi lé la nga nyé tsa sum lha

text.en: Heroic warriors who enjoy the secret play of bliss and delight,
text.en-trans: sangwa gyé dé gar rol pawö dé

text.en: Hosts of ḍākinīs who captivate the minds of all,
text.en-trans: yichen tenpa trok dzé daki tsok

text.en: In your seductive guise of illusory bliss and emptiness,
text.en-trans: detong gyumé gar gyi jé chak zuk

text.en: Let your beautiful, impressive dance of form fill the whole of space,
text.en-trans: dzé ji ku yi gar gyi namkha gang

text.en: Let the ceaseless melody of your speech pervade a thousand realms,
text.en-trans: gakmé sung gi nyen gyur tong kham khyab

text.en: And the expressions of your bliss-empty awareness move saṃsāra and nirvāṇa.
text.en-trans: detong rigpé tsalnang khordé yo

text.en: Wondrous deities of magnetizing activity,
text.en-trans: ngotsar wang gi trinlé lhatsok la

text.en: Fervently I pray to you: consider me with your love.
text.en-trans: dungwé soldeb tsewé jé gong té

text.en: Through the great blessing of basic freedom, pure and equal,
text.en-trans: zhi drol dak nyam yeshe jin chen gyi

text.en: May my three doors be spontaneously perfected as the three vajras,
text.en-trans: go sum dorjé sum du lhün dzok né

text.en: And the whole of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa enter the sphere of great bliss.
text.en-trans: khordé chö kün dechen tikler dum

text.en: Grant me supreme and ordinary siddhis for magnetizing appearance and existence, I pray.
text.en-trans: nangsi wangdü choktün ngödrub tsol
